# Libraries

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse)
library(httr2)
library(igraph)
library(visNetwork)
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(here)
```

# Get the data

```{r}
nodes <- read_csv(here("network_data", "nodes.csv"))
links <- read_csv(here("network_data", "edges.csv"))
```

```{r}
head(nodes)
head(links)
```
### Graph:

```{r}
graph <- graph_from_data_frame(links, directed = FALSE, vertices = nodes)
graph
```
